justification: The Offering ('The Ring is trying to get back to its master') and Interfaces ('The pirates buried their treasure in a secret location') do not reference simulation, digital twins, or imitation of processes. There is no mention of using historical information, physical models, or simulation for training or what-if scenarios.
ability: The ability to create approximate imitation of a process or a system using past historical information, physical models, video, audio, and animation, what-if-scenarios.
